definition: to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Their response to the proposal was, at best, cool.
sentences.chinese: 他們對提議的反應充其量只能說是漠然置之。

sentences.english: This is a partial list at best.
sentences.chinese: 這裏列舉的充其量只是一小部分。

sentences.english: Meat is, at best, a secondary source of essential elements.
sentences.chinese: 肉類充其量不過是身體基本要素的次要來源。

sentences.english: At best they are just crocodile tears.
sentences.chinese: 充其量也就是鱷魚的眼淚。

sentences.english: There is the Oedipus Complex, at best, so easy to marry a wife more than Sister.
sentences.chinese: 有戀母情結的，充其量容易娶個大姐做老婆而已。

sentences.english: At best you are looking at five years down the road.
sentences.chinese: 充其量，只能在五年後纔會看到這樣的情況。

sentences.english: The accommodation for the press was makeshift at best.
sentences.chinese: 遷就新聞界充其量只是個權宜之計。

sentences.english: Than the least of the empty shells that strewed the area of grass of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 充其量不過是散佈在山岡草地上的空空的貝殼。

sentences.english: She is decidedly not. She is, at best, the most-read blogger on sina's blogging service .
sentences.chinese: 而實際上，徐靜蕾充其量只是在新浪博客中排名第一。

sentences.english: But it's an incomplete model at best.
sentences.chinese: 但它充其量是一個不完整的範例。

sentences.english: The empirical evidence for the PHH is at best mixed.
sentences.chinese: 環境避難所假說的實證充其量就是個混合體。

sentences.english: We can only finish half of it this afternoon at best.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午我們充其量只能完成一半。

sentences.english: So, it was hard to regard the political opening of Emperor Hanwu as a product of "the Confucianism Worship Alone".
sentences.chinese: 充其量可以說，“獨尊儒術”開武帝政治開放之一途。

sentences.english: Darwinian man, though well-behaved, at best is only a monkey shaved.
sentences.chinese: 達爾文的人，雖然乖巧，充其量只是一隻猴子剃掉。

sentences.english: A decade ago distance learning was experimental at best.
sentences.chinese: 十年前，遠程教育充其量只能說是處在試驗階段。

sentences.english: The origins of structural theories are eclectic at best.
sentences.chinese: 結構主義理論的起源充其量也不過是折衷主義。

definition: a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
up to the maximum/upper limit/at most
to achieve with difficulty/only just up to the task/barely adequate
good and bad/most unfortunate occurrence/in any case/whatever
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
at the minimum/at the very least
